mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_group_appeal_in (appeal_id, group_id, student_id, appeal_date) VALUES (#{appealId}, #{groupId}, #{studentId}, #{appealDate})
mapper.select: SELECT bgai.appeal_id, bgai.student_id, bs.student_name, bs.avatar AS student_avatar, bgai.appeal_date FROM b_group_appeal_in bgai LEFT OUTER JOIN b_student bs ON bgai.student_id = bs.student_id WHERE bgai.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY appeal_date DESC
